Articles.Content:
Just a small experiment.

> 
> ![fa0qz76.png](http://i.imgur.com/fa0qz76.png)
> 
> 

First time I've successfully used layer masks in gimp.
The first time I posted in this thread.
Geez, that is cool! I've known about layer masks, but dang! I didn't know they could do that! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
the shop is strong with this one.

The shadow on the dragon is what gives the "realistic" effect. Even though it's bad.

My friend forgot to turn on the high-quality setting, so I tried and failed to make the shadow crummy.

> 
> The shadow on the dragon is what gives the "realistic" effect. Even though it's bad.
> My friend forgot to turn on the high-quality setting, so I tried and failed to make the shadow crummy.

Still, way better than what I could accomplish. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
